EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-29 Partner Program Launch - Follow-Up.ES-2018-05-29 Partner Program L
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic New Partner Program Launch Recording
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Our new partner program launch event on May 15th was a tremendous success and we could not have done this without you.
The feedback and support have been overwhelming. Read CRN’s Turbonomic Doubles Down On Channel Commitment with Overhauled, Hybrid-Cloud Focused Program <[[https://www.crn.com/news/cloud/300103736/crn-exclusive-turbonomic-doubles-down-on-channel-commitment-with-overhauled-hybrid-cloud-focused-program.htm]]>.
If you missed the event or would like to see the launch-cast again, simply go here to view the recording <[[https://www.webcaster4.com/Webcast/Page/1848/25145]]>.
Also, we’ve created some new tools and resources to make it easier and quicker to sell Turbonomic. Below are some items that might be of interest to you:
- The SMART (Self Managing and Real-Time) Workload Video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/the-smart-workload-v3]]> - CIO Guide to Autonomic IT Whitepaper <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/template/turbonomic-cio-guide-to-autonomic-it]]> - Turbonomic 6.1 New Features Video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]>
All of the above items could be found on our Partner Portal. To request access, email PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com <[[mailto:PartnerDesk@Turbonomic.com]]>.
Thanks again for your support of our new partner program and happy selling!
Regards, Turbonomic
